Articles.Content:
This is a pretty simple suggestion: instead of just a list of craft files when clicking "load", it would be nice to see subfolders in the SPH and VAB folders, and possibly separating stock and user made ships; for better organization.

Some games i can think of that use this system are TrackMania and Algodoo (then again these 2 are mostly based around sharing maps/scenes and also include ingame web browser for directly downloading and playing, now that'd be swell)

It would allow us for example to put downloaded craft in a separate folder, and in that folder, more tiny folders for ship packs and such (basically, whatever name you give to said folder)

i apologize in advance for excessive use of the word "folder". huehuehue

Edited March 21, 2014 by Hachouma

Good idea, I have a "few" ships and loader takes some seconds to load EVERY time (fair enough, these vessels are not saves in memory at least ), and I don't use all of them always nor I would like to keep things separated (landers, standard rockets, experimental things, and so on).

+ Already suggested I think: miniature of the vessels (take on the first load maybe), date of creation and sort option.
